name: cuttlebone
description: ukagaka shell renderer for web browser

scripts.build: npm run build-src; npm run build-test
scripts.build-src: npm run build-src-cs; npm run build-src-ts
scripts.build-src-cs: node node_modules/coffee-script/bin/coffee -cm --join lib/cuttlebone.js -- src/header.coffee src/*.coffee src/footer.coffee
scripts.build-test: node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc test/*.ts; npm run espower
scripts.watch: npm run build; npm run watch-dialog; grunt
scripts.update: npm update; bower update; tsd update --save --overwrite;
scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build; npm run watch

author: Ikagaka
